text: Ann Louise Wagner (n√©e Trousdale, September 13, 1962) is an American politician and diplomat. She is the U.S. Representative for Missouri's 2nd congressional district since 2013. She is a member of the Republican Party. She was the United States Ambassador to Luxembourg from 2005 to 2009. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:United States representatives from Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Ann Wagner
